settings.content: If you require any support please review the [documentation](http://help.pixelunion.net/customer/portal/articles/1565085-documentation) or contact us at [support@pixelunion.net](mailto:support@pixelunion.net)
Find us on the web: [Pixel Union](http://www.pixelunion.net) | Twitter: [@pixelunion](http://twitter.com/pixelunion) | Facebook: [http://facebook.com/pixelunion](http://facebook.com/pixelunion)

settings.label: Logo
settings.info: Maximum height is 100px. Larger images will be resized.

settings.label: Logo Height
settings.info: Required for the checkout screen and retina images. Enter the numeric value, excluding the “px”

settings.label: Logo (Retina)
settings.info: Retina logos must be twice the size of a regular logo. If your regular logo is 180x100 then your retina logo must be 360x200.

settings.label: Background Image Width *
settings.info: Required for retina images. Enter the numeric value, excluding the “px”

settings.info: Required for retina images. Enter the numeric value, excluding the “px”

settings.label: Layout
settings.info: When the navigation layout is set to 'Header,' navigation will collapse into the 'Navigation Drawer' if there isn't enough space.

settings.label: Enable mega-navigation system
settings.info: The mega-navigation system is only functional when the navigation layout is set to 'Below Header.'

settings.label: Currencies You Wish to Support
settings.info: Separate [currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) with a space. Example: CAD USD.

settings.content: Note: While prices can be displayed on the store front in different currencies, Shopify will process orders in the shop’s main currency.

settings.label: Enable Hero Module
settings.info: Both the hero and the slideshow module cannot be active at the same time.

settings.content: Note: To change the background, text and button colours, find the “Home: Slideshow and Hero Sections” menu within the Backgrounds & Colours section.

settings.label: Enable Slideshow
settings.info: Both the hero and the slideshow module cannot be active at the same time.

settings.label: Layout
settings.info: [Style examples](http://cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/startup-slideshow-layouts.png)

settings.label: Header Colours Override
settings.info: If your header colours and full-bleed slideshow image are clashing, this will override the homepage header colours to be only white or black.

settings.content: If you have enabled one of the full-bleed slideshows and have selected either the "White" or "Black" Header Colours Override you may want to upload additional logos:
Note: To change the text colours on the slide, including navigation, find the “Home: Slideshow and Hero Sections” menu within the Backgrounds & Colours section.
Reorder the home page sections any way you like! Enter the letter of each section you want displayed in the order that you want them to appear and separate them with a hyphen.

settings.label: A: Full-Width Features B: Alternating Features C: In-Line Features D: Testimonials E: Order Now F: Featured Collections G: Featured Products H: Featured Blog I: As Seen On J: Instagram Widget
settings.info: Example: A-D-B.

settings.content: This section is designed to showcase your product philosophy. Display up to three Full-Width Features, either as images or videos. Expand on each feature with a title, text and call to action button.

The [Alternating Features](http://cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/alternating-features-screenshot.png) are designed to explain product specifics in a clean and organized format. This section can display up to three features with alternating alignments.

settings.label: Product
settings.info: The first product in the collection selected will be displayed for the “Order Now” section.

settings.label: Description
settings.info: Override your long product description with one better suited to the home page.

settings.label: Enable
settings.info: Sends the customer directly to the checkout screen after adding the product to their cart. This feature is disabled if "Line Item Properties" is enabled in the "Products" section.

settings.label: Collections Per Page
settings.info: Collection pagination will only work when “Specific Link List” is set to “None.”

settings.label: Display When Stock is Lower Than:

settings.content: The slideshow can be enabled on a product by product basis by changing the product's template to product.slideshow. You can change any product's template at the bottom of the product edit screen for that product.

settings.label: Layout
settings.info: [Style examples](http://cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/startup-slideshow-layouts.png)

settings.content: You may need to use overrides for the header when using the "Full-Width, Full-Bleed" or "Full-Width/Height, Full-Bleed" slideshow layouts.
If you have selected either the "White" or "Black" Header Colours Override you may want to upload additional logos:

[Additional Info Links](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/additional-info-screenshot.png) appear wherever a customer can view product information. They’re perfect for linking to size charts, refund policies, or ordering details. Pick from six unique icons.
Note: Add a contact form to any page by editing the page and selecting “page.contact” as the page template.
Note: The special instructions feature gives your customers the ability to offer special instructions for shipping on checkout.

settings.label: Default Country
settings.info: Note: If a customer is logged-in, their default shipping address country will be selected. Unsure about spelling? Refer to the first checkout page.

settings.content: See the [documentation](http://help.pixelunion.net/customer/portal/articles/1565085-documentation) for help connecting a MailChimp or Campaign Monitor account.
Modal settings only apply if you have selected "Shopify Customer List" as your Platform.

Startup will automatically display social icons based on the links you provide in your social link list. For this feature to work, the link list you wish to add social icons to must have the handle "social-icons". See the [documentation](http://help.pixelunion.net/customer/portal/articles/1565085-documentation) for further assistance.

Supported social networks: 500px, Behance, Blogger, Dailymotion, Delicious, Digg, Dribbble, Facebook, Feedburner, Flickr, Foursquare, GitHub, Google, Grooveshark, Instagram, last.fm, LinkedIn, MySpace, Pinterest, Reddit, Skype, Slideshare, Soundcloud, Spotify, Steam, Stumbleupon, Tumblr, Twitter, Vimeo, Vine, WordPress, Yahoo, Yelp, YouTube.
Payment icons are displayed below your store's copyright message in the footer.

settings.label: Disable Ajax
settings.info: Check this if you're having trouble integrating with 3rd Party apps or use line item properties

settings.label: Custom CSS
settings.info: Add any style overrides that aren't available through the theme's settings

settings.content: Meta tags include [Facebook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/opengraph/using-objects/) and [Pinterest](https://developers.pinterest.com/rich_pins/) Open Graph Tags and [Twitter Cards](https://dev.twitter.com/docs/cards/types/product-card) . These are enabled by default to make the store more accessible on different platforms, and more readable for search engines.

settings.label: Site's Twitter Handle
settings.info: E.g. @PixelUnion. Required for Twitter Cards.
